title: Seboun Black Seed & Juniper Tar Soap - 100% Natural Bar Soap for Body & Hair – Handmade with Olive Oil & Coconut Oil – 3.5oz Bar
features: ALL-NATURAL CLEANSING: Seboun Black Seed & Juniper Tar Soap is handmade with 100% natural vegan oils to thoroughly cleanse and nourish skin and hair.
MOISTURIZING & SOOTHING: All our products are enriched with Olive Oil & Coconut Oil to deeply moisturize dry skin and help soothe eczema and psoriasis.
CLEARS ACNE: Effective yet gentle, our oil blends can reduce acne without drying skin, containing natural anti-bacterial, anti-fungal and anti-inflammatory properties.
SPECIALLY CRAFTED: Made using a cold process method, this soap is infused with Black Seed Oil and Juniper Wood Oil which can calm red, irritated skin.
GOOD FOR YOU & THE WORLD: All Seboun Natural Soaps are vegan, palm-free and cruelty-free, and are formulated without parabens, fragrance or preservatives.
description: Seboun 100% Natural Soaps & Shampoo Bars cleanse, moisturize and nourish skin and hair with high-quality, natural ingredients. Handmade, using a cold process method and 100% natural vegan oils, our products have simple ingredient lists and are suitable for all skin and hair types. Our effective oil blends feature Olive Oil and Coconut Oil which can moisturize dry skin and hair, soothe eczema and psoriasis and even help reduce acne, containing many anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties. Our bars also include scented essential oils to provide targeted skin and hair benefits. Seboun soaps are vegan, palm-free and cruelty-free, and are formulated without parabens, fragrance or preservatives. Our mission is to bring awareness to nature’s healing powers while holistically treating skin and hair.

Seboun Soaps and Shampoo Bars are for external use only. Do not use if you are allergic to any of the ingredients. Avoid contact with eyes. Store in a cool and dry place. Discontinue use if irritation occurs.
